channel.title: [718] Spektrem | 718 | Active Community | 24/7 | Vote4Cash | Great Staff |
channel.description:
[CENTER]~~~~~~~Credits To Matrix~~~~~~~ ~We Are Changing The Server Name To Spektrem Next Month , This Is Why It Says Spektrem ~ [size=18pt]Play Now:[/size] [URL=http://"http://rsnation728.com/webclient/Client.jar"]Download[/URL] [URL=http://"http://rsnation728.com/play.html"]Webclient[/URL]
Website/Forums [URL=http://"http://rsnation728.com/"]Spektrem[/URL]
Vote Links [URL=http://rsnation728.com/vote/#?step=1"]Vote Here[/URL]
[Features] No lag. Dedicated server with 1 Gbps internet connection. Very stable server. Daily Updates. Decent drop rates. Double Drop Weekends. Donator zone and Extreme Donator Zone for the awesome donators :) Owner listens to your suggestions. Auto donation(Under construction). Auto Vote to claim your vote rewards instantly.
Features: Player Point Shop Dominion Tower Gilded Altar Castle Wars Money Pouch (Shop and trade Support) Clan Wars Safe and Risk portal for fun fights. Duel Arena with Staking. Glacors with fire spell weekness. Forinthry Dungeon for pvp items. Kuradals Dungeon FightCaves/Fight Kiln Queen Black Dragon Barrows Jadinko Lair Frost Dragons Slayer Tower with all floors (including slayer task system) Polypore Dungeon Corporeal Beast Kalphite Queen Bork Tormented Demons Godwars (Zaros/Nex, Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, Saradomin) Nex Working Dice Bag & Mithril Seeds[/COLOR][/SPOILER]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9jhJOrL.png[/img]
[Media] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3Vwluln.png[/img] Starter Items! Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays![/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HmFEd3J.png[/img] Great Home With Flawless Training Next To It![/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mRfDO5H.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AoOxBoP.jpg[/img] ------------------------------------------------------ Dice Bag For Great Gambing[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aqxdSPT.png[/img] 100% Summoning[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dkgwkgP.jpg[/img] Donator Shop (Extreme Shop is under construction).[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dzGK3h4.png[/img] Extreme Donator Zone(Being Developed).[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aMkzRFX.jpg[/img] 100% Fight Caves & Fight Kiln[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9O0FZeO.png[/img] ------------------------------------------------------ BOSSES: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nbJ5Lcl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PSIagiz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2U8V1ec.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6mG6D4g.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5glquo5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GwqU1sx.jpg[/img] Donator Only Boss! Drops Great Items! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vLsQXrK.jpg[/img] Fully Functional Clan Wars! Clan vs Clan! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/c1vEggc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OYu7Lbq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oBqc3Vw.png[/img] ------------------------------------------------------ Player Point Shop(Will be fixed up soon). [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cretnPD.png[/img] Thieving Stalls For Great Money Making! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1ZKbT1p.jpg[/img] ----------------------------------------------------- Teleport around Spektrem! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VXWtsBy.png[/img] Mini-Games! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6GWT0Z9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FFSNUvR.png[/img] Training! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YnfOW54.png[/img] Bossing! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ws1r2Vv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9AQ49jb.png[/img] PVP! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kew7wy6.png[/img] More Options(Shanty Pass)! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LnMoKO9.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
All New Comers That Join By December 25th Get a Santa Hat! [URL=http://"http://rsnation728.com"]Join Today![/URL]
We will release a video soon![/B] [/CENTER]
